channel.title: How do i make npc say other things?
channel.description: hi, i got a moosescape source and i dont know how to make the npc's say ..blah blha blah is offline.. to my name ??

item.title: How do i make npc say other things?
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

You dont change the .class files.

Also you can change the NPC that says that.
If you want to do that open up autospawn.cfg

Find the npcID of the current npc, change it to the second id. (You must also do that in NPCHandler.java)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc say other things?

item.title: How do i make npc say other things?
item.dc:creator: @skys_shadow skys shadow
item.description:
@skys_shadow wrote:

ok well since its my source i might as well help you lol

open up npchandler.java and search for moose sabre

change

if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Moose Sabre ")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Moose Sabre is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Moose Sabre is OFFLINE"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1835) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("welshy")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welshy is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welshy is OFFLINE"; } } }

to

if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("YOURACCOUNTNAME")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner YOURACCOUNTNAME is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner YOURACCOUNTNAME is OFFLINE"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1835) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("WHOSEVERNAMEYOUWANTTOPUTINHERE")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "PERSONSNAME is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "PERSONSNAME is OFFLINE"; } } }

hope it helps =D

Read full topic
